response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $12,000. Considering its significance to you, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair deal for both parties. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and allow us to proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
